if_else_conditional.name: If/Else conditional
if_else_conditional.code: if( condition ) { statement } else { else statement }

if_elseif_conditional.name: If/ElseIf conditional
if_elseif_conditional.code: if( condition ) { statement } elseif { elseif statement }

if_elseif_else_conditional.name: If/ElseIf/Else conditional
if_elseif_else_conditional.code: if( condition ) { statement } elseif { elseif statement } else { else statement }

while_loop.name: While loop
while_loop.code: while( true condition ) { code to be executed }

do_while_loop.name: Do/While loop
do_while_loop.code: do { executable code } while ( true condition );

for_loops.name: For loop
for_loops.code: for ( intial_counter, test_counter, increment ) { executable code }

foreach_loops.name: Foreach loop
foreach_loops.code: foreach ( iterable as item ) { executable code }

map_iteration.name: Map iteration
map_iteration.code: array_map( function( element ) { transform element }, array );

filter_iteration.name: Filter iteration
filter_iteration.code: array_filter( array, function( element ) { return a bool } );
